description: syscall: ignore godefs input when building on Plan 9

messages.text:
Would it be better to perhaps rewrite types_plan9.c in cgo, conforming
to the other OSes?  I feel this issue could be avoided in that way as
well.


Akshat

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

Akshat Kumar <akumar@mail.nanosouffle.net> once said:
> Would it be better to perhaps rewrite types_plan9.c in cgo, conforming
> to the other OSes?  I feel this issue could be avoided in that way as
> well.
> 
> 
> Akshat

I have another CL for this already¹ but it may
not be acceptable right now.  I'd like to see
this fix submitted in the meantime.

  Anthony
